parameters.name: workspace_object_type
parameters.description: (string) The workspace object type for which to get or manage permissions.

parameters.name: workspace_object_id
parameters.description: (string) The workspace object for which to get or manage permissions.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

put.description: Sets permissions on an object, replacing existing permissions if they exist. Deletes all direct permissions if none are specified. Objects can inherit permissions from their parent objects or root object.
